ComicInfo.Title: Clean & Clearly Repulsive; Toon People; 7 Lousy Replacement Shows for 7 Lousy Shows; Darnugly & Greed; At the Movies, Didja Ever Notice That...; OK-Mart the Discount Store That Looks It; It's All the (Road) Rage!; A Push in the Right Direction; The World Is Not Enough Starring Homer Simpson; The Bicentennial Man Featuring the Characters from Futurama; Car Games for Snow-Stranded Travelers; Valentine Cards for Your Loathed Ones; Pukemon the First Movie...
